Package com.btmatthews.atlas.jcr

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CredentialsProvider
    Implementations of CredentialsProvider are used to obtain the global application wide credentials that are required to log on to the repository when there is no end-user or an administrative operations is being performed.
    JCRAccessor  
    NodeCallback<T>
    A callback used to events for individual repository nodes and return a typed result.
    NodeVoidCallback
    A callback used to events for individual repository nodes.
    RepositoryProvider
    Used to lookup the JCR repository.
    SessionCallback<T>
    This callback is passed to JCRAccessor methods that perform perform operations on the JCR session and return a typed result.
    SessionFactory
    A factory that provides session objects used to interact with the Java Content Repository.
    SessionVoidCallback
    This callback is passed to JCRAccessor methods that perform perform operations on the JCR session.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SessionHolder
    This holder is used to manage the association of JCR sessions with threads using a thread local variable.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RepositoryAccessException
